query: Can you find artworks related to Van Gogh in the Art Institute of Chicago's collection, and generate an avatar with a 'pixel-art' style using the name 'ArtLover' as the seed?
model_answer:
Here are some artworks related to Van Gogh from the Art Institute of Chicago's collection:

1. **The Bedroom**
   ![Painting of bedroom, blue walls, green window, tan bed, red bedding.](https://api.artic.edu/iiif/2/14407/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to The Bedroom](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/28560)

2. **Self-Portrait**
   ![Painting of a red-haired, bearded man with light skin, painted in short brushstrokes and multicolored dots. The background is likewise a mass of small, closely spaced colored dots, these in green, blue, and red-orange.](https://api.artic.edu/iiif/2/7546/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to Self-Portrait](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/80607)

3. **The Poet's Garden**
   ![Lush tall grasses with small white flowers foreground a grove of bushy trees of varying types and heights, their leaves ranging from deep green to golden. Beneath a dense and heavy yellow sky, a small blue triangle suggesting a mountain peak crests above the treeline at far left.](https://api.artic.edu/iiif/2/8770/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to The Poet's Garden](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/14586)

4. **A Peasant Woman Digging in Front of Her Cottage**
   ![Painting in tones of gray and brown, with some green and blue, of a woman digging with a garden tool before a structure with a thatched roof that descends almost to the ground. Above her the sky is gray and blue, a haze of clouds.](https://api.artic.edu/iiif/2/6255/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to A Peasant Woman Digging in Front of Her Cottage](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/28862)

5. **The Drinkers**
   ![Painting of three male figures, two older men in top hats and a younger man with red hair, standing outdoors around a wooden table with a pitcher on it, drinking from glasses. A much smaller, childlike figure at left peers over the table and drinks from a white cup. The scene is rendered in winding paint strokes in shades of green and blue.](https://api.artic.edu/iiif/2/5922/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to The Drinkers](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/79349)

6. **Fishing in Spring, the Pont de Clichy (Asnières)**
   ![Painting in short strokes of pale blue, green, white, yellow, and pink, of a fisherman in one of two small boats on a river, a tree-lined bank and a bridge in the background.](https://api.artic.edu/iiif/2/10057/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to Fishing in Spring, the Pont de Clichy (Asnières)](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/109314)

7. **Madame Roulin Rocking the Cradle (La berceuse)**
   ![A work made of oil on canvas.](https://api.artic.edu/iiif/2/8676/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to Madame Roulin Rocking the Cradle (La berceuse)](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/27949)

8. **Terrace and Observation Deck at the Moulin de Blute-Fin, Montmartre**
   ![A work made of oil on canvas, mounted on pressboard.](https://api.artic.edu/iiif/2/1699/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to Terrace and Observation Deck at the Moulin de Blute-Fin, Montmartre](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/27954)

9. **Grapes, Lemons, Pears, and Apples**
   ![A work made of oil on canvas.](https://api.artic.edu/iiif/2/2717/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to Grapes, Lemons, Pears, and Apples](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/64957)

10. **Weeping Tree**
   ![A work made of reed pen and black-brown ink, with black chalk on off-white wove paper.](https://api.artic.edu/iiif/2/6536/full/843,/0/default.jpg)
   - [Link to Weeping Tree](https://api.artic.edu/api/v1/artworks/52733)
